description: Almost a roadside fall!  If you are in the Baxter's Harbour area, its a very scenic fall to see.  It has a perfect drop of about 20ft and is framed in a small ravine.
directions: Park approximately at N45° 12.958' W64° 32.444' on the Long Beach Rd.  Its about 700m south of the intersection with old baxter harbour rd.  The fall is approximately at; N45° 12.880' W64° 32.498'
title: Long Beach Brook Fall
